etri.sdn.controller.module.topologymanager

Interface ITopologyService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OFMTopologyManager

    public interface ITopologyService
extends IService
    This interface is used to define a service that OFMTopologyManager should implement.
    Author:
    SaeHyong Park (labry@etri.re.kr)

      • getBlockedPorts

        java.util.Set<NodePortTuple> getBlockedPorts()
        Returns a set of blocked ports. The set of blocked ports is the union of all the blocked ports across all instances.

      • getLastLinkUpdates

        java.util.List<ILinkDiscoveryListener.LDUpdate> getLastLinkUpdates()
        ITopologyListener provides topologyChanged notification, but not *what* the changes were. This method returns the delta in the linkUpdates between the current and the previous topology instance.
        Returns:
        List
